mapper.insert: insert into notice(nno, ntitle, nid, ncontent) values(notice_seq.nextval, #{ntitle}, '관리자', #{ncontent} )
mapper.select: select * from ( select a.* from (select * from notice order by nno desc)a)
mapper.update: update NOTICE set ntitle = #{ntitle}, ncontent = #{ncontent}, updatedate = sysdate where nno = #{nno}
